title: High support: set shin horizontal (outer hip/glute release)
description: Right foot on high support, knee bent. Gently press knee down/in so shin rests; foot stays planted, torso long. Hold 20-30 s, 2 sets/side. No pressure on patella (towel under knee if needed).

title: High support: gentle sinking + tiny knee swings
description: A) Exhale: hinge into thigh 1-2 s → back. B) Tiny knee swings 1-2 cm over foot. 2-4 + 6-10 per side. Keep back neutral, foot rooted; never press kneecap; stop if pain/shooting.

title: Figure-4 stretch on the mat (lying)
description: Supine: right ankle on left knee. Hold left thigh and draw until a light right‑glute stretch. 20-40 s or 6-10 breath pulses; switch. Hold thigh (not shin); no kneecap pressure.

title: Knee to chest with ankle on the other knee
description: Supine: left foot on floor; right ankle on left knee, foot flexed. Hold right knee/upper shin and draw to chest to glute stretch. 6-10 or 20-30 s/side. No patella pressure; no shooting pain.

title: Press the knee away with a block (ankle on knee)
description: Supine: right ankle on left knee; block/palm between right knee and torso. Gently press knee away 2-4 cm; hold 20-40 s, 1-2 sets/side (or 4-6 short cycles). Don’t press patella; stop if pain/shooting.

title: Soft pigeon (knee-friendly)
description: From kneeling: right knee forward/out, left leg back; pelvis on cushion. Right foot closer to pelvis; light fold onto thigh. 20-30 s/side. Skip if knee sensitive; exit with any knee discomfort.

title: Ball under the glute: trigger point
description: Sit, firm ball under tender right‑glute spot. Dose weight with hands. Micro‑moves: knee bend/extend, thigh shift, 1-2 cm circles. 30-60 s/point. Stop for numbness/shooting. Chair alternative is OK.

title: Balance on a block/cube
description: Stand on stable block, feet hip‑width. 30 s eyes open → 30 s open/close → 30 s closed. Avoid knee collapse; simplify if painful.

title: Supine: soft hip mobilization
description: Comfort range only: a) Diagonal reach 5-8/side. b) Toes in-out 10-15. c) Two‑knee rocks 8-12. d) Single‑knee inward 6-10/side. e) Small hip circles 30-45 s/side.

title: Finish: easy walk and ankle/toe pumps
description: Finish: walk calmly 1-2 min; gentle ankle/toe pumps.
